Text.Name: Item_Yao_CatSoul
Text.ThingName: เพชรวิญญาณแมว
Text.Desc: Soul fragment of a cat Yaoguai, probably has something to do with the saying that cats have nine lives. It contains some mysterious power, consuming it will grant you an extra sub-spirit. This item can only be taken once during a lifetime. Only effective to cultivators that have reached their Primordial Spirit phase.
